ai-anya-e0605n27:5_0: by that Realised One, the Realised One,
ai-anya-e0605n27:8_0: while in the whole world with its gods,
ai-anya-e0605n27:9_0: marriageable for the advantages of predatory animals,
ai-anya-e0605n27:10_0: Then the Happy One, after considering (the Bodhisatta),
ai-anya-e0605n27:12_0: (That which is) the teaching and training, and whatever is included in the Dhamma and Discipline, he who is wise,
ai-anya-e0605n27:13_0: That’s why Sumedhā, having insight into the advantage of points,
ai-anya-e0605n27:14_0: Seeing the cause of reason for a great earthquake, (thinking): “Even though I have come to this great fruit,
ai-anya-e0605n27:16_0: He who, out of faith, went to that Bodhi (Tree)
ai-anya-e0605n27:17_0: Who has such virtue and virtues,
ai-anya-e0605n27:21_0: Should have come out about faith,
ai-anya-e0605n27:22_0: bowing down to you, they’re honored.
ai-anya-e0605n27:23_0: in the world with its gods.
ai-anya-e0605n27:24_0: Yet when the group of people are born,
